targets.query:
from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "binary_sensor" and (contains(value: r["entity_id"], set: "door") or contains(value: r["entity_id"], set: "motion") or contains(value: r["entity_id"], set: "window")))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "on")
  |> count()

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "lock" or (r["domain"] == "binary_sensor" and contains(value: r["entity_id"], set: "door")))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["event_type"] == "state_changed")
  |> count()

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["event_type"] == "automation_triggered")
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / (r._value + 1.0) * 100.0}))

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "binary_sensor" and (contains(value: r["entity_id"], set: "door") or contains(value: r["entity_id"], set: "window")))
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["entity_id", "state", "_time"])

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["event_type"] == "automation_triggered")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "binary_sensor" and contains(value: r["entity_id"], set: "motion"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "on")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "lock")
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "locked")
  |> count()

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "binary_sensor" and (contains(value: r["entity_id"], set: "motion") or contains(value: r["entity_id"], set: "door")))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "on")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 50)

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["event_type"] == "automation_triggered")
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "binary_sensor" and contains(value: r["entity_id"], set: "motion"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "on")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["event_type"] == "automation_triggered")
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])
  |> count()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 10)
